title: MARY GOLDEN
maintext: MARY GOLDEN, 84, of Ironton, widow of Bobby Golden, died Oct. 9. She was a former retail manager with Hills Department Stores. There will be a graveside service 4 p.m. Friday, Wilgus Fairview Cemetery. Visitation will be from 2:30 to 3:30 p.m. Friday at Phillips Funeral Home, Ironton. www.phillipsfuneralhome.net.
